original_text: Then Balaam spoke this message from God. He said, ‘This is the message of Balaam, the son of Beor. It is the message of a man who sees clearly.
korean_text: 예언하여 이르기를 브올의 아들 발람이 말하며 눈을 감았던 자가 말하며

sentences.original_text: Then Balaam spoke this message from God.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 발람이 하나님의 이 메시지를 말했다.

sentences.original_text: 'This is the message of Balaam, the son of Beor.
It is the message of a man who sees clearly.'
